title: Life's Amazing Secrets
author: Gaur Gopal Das
description: The year 1900 BC. In what modern Indians mistakenly call the Indus Valley Civilisation. The inhabitants of that period called it the land of Meluha–a near perfect empire created many centuries earlier by Lord Ram, one of the greatest monarchs that ever lived. This is one of the best works of Amish Tripathi till date, and the inclusion of Manish Dongardive as the narrator has taken this book to a whole new level. I think I'll keep revisiting this audiobook after every few years.

comment.title: An spellbinding book and a master narrator
